title: Hedgehog Lab Foundations
summary_markdown:
Build your foundation for hands-on learning in the Hedgehog Virtual Lab! This course covers accessing your cloud-based learning environment and introduces you to Kubernetes fundamentals.

You'll start by learning how to connect to the Hedgehog Virtual Lab (VLAB) across all three major cloud providers, then dive into your first Kubernetes hands-on lab. By the end of this course, you'll be comfortable accessing your learning environment and deploying your first containerized application.

content_blocks.title: Welcome to Hedgehog Lab Foundations
content_blocks.body_markdown: This course provides everything you need to get started with hands-on learning in the Hedgehog Virtual Lab. You'll learn how to access your cloud environment and complete your first Kubernetes lab.

content_blocks.title: Part 1: Access Your Virtual Lab
content_blocks.body_markdown: The Hedgehog Virtual Lab (VLAB) is your dedicated cloud environment. Choose one of the following modules based on your preferred cloud provider to learn how to access your VLAB.

content_blocks.title: Part 2: Introduction to Kubernetes
content_blocks.body_markdown: Now that you can access your VLAB, it's time to deploy your first application! The Introduction to Kubernetes module will guide you through fundamental Kubernetes concepts with hands-on exercises.

content_blocks.title: Next Steps
content_blocks.body_markdown: Congratulations on completing the Hedgehog Lab Foundations! You're now ready to explore intermediate Kubernetes topics including storage and networking. Check the pathways page to continue your learning journey!
